overview: As CTO of T3Media, Mark Lemmons oversees strategic technology and product roadmaps, as well as the development of new products and technologies. Mark has more than 15 years of experience in digital film and video management, search technology, content re-use, and video licensing. In his role, Mark brings seasoned expertise in key areas such as digital asset management, search and metadata technologies for creative assets, and large-scale database management and security. Prior to T3Media, Mark led the Creative Software Group at Creo, a global company with key strengths in digital imaging and software technology. At Creo, he established and led the teamâ€™s email-based asset management product, which enabled the rapid and secure search and retrieval of information from large-scale email databases. Mark also served as VP of strategic development at Quark.
